name: Galaxy Gardener
description:
Ludum Dare 46 late entry

Theme: Keep it alive

First attempt at a solo game jam while prioritizing sleep and taking lots of breaks here and there. Overall, ended up with half something but I'm still well energized haha



Click on ground tiles to plant seeds. Seeds grow overnight into crops. Once a crop is fully grown, it can be harvested by clicking on it. Keep an eye on your health as you lose some when ending a day with an empty belly! Otherwise, end a day with a full stomach and you'll regain lost health. Try to survive as long as possible :)

No, there's nothing else to do in this half-way done version haha
